pageContext.claim: “We may be in the process of leaving Syria, but in no way have we Abandoned the Kurds, who are special people and wonderful fighters.”
pageContext.analysis: This is an Orwellian statement. Trump's decision to remove U.S. troops from that region of Syria opened the door to a Turkish incursion to crush the Kurdish fighters. In effect, he abandoned these long-time U.S. allies.
